QuestData.Title: Silence in the City
QuestData.Description: There is a troubling silence from Suramar City this day.$b$bOculeth just informed me that the teleporter to the Waning Crescent has gone dark. He is not able to reach Vanthir, nor am I.$b$bWhile I am hesitant to believe something dire has happened, I do feel this warrants investigation.$b$bSpeak with Oculeth and see if he can transport you to the Waning Crescent. We need to find out what happened.
QuestData.RewardText: Something is amiss. I can feel it in my bones.
